summary: Frontend testing completed for Maestro Habitat web app. All requested features verified working. Fixed 3 translation issues in new pages.
passed_tests: Login page does NOT have Google Sign-In button - VERIFIED
Forgot Password page shows lock icon and proper design - VERIFIED
Account page navigation - Edit Profile goes to /edit-profile - VERIFIED
Account page navigation - Language goes to /language - VERIFIED
Account page navigation - Subscription goes to /subscription - VERIFIED
Account page navigation - Reminders goes to /reminders - VERIFIED
Account page navigation - Reports goes to /reports - VERIFIED
Coach Detail page loads without crashing when clicking on a coach card - VERIFIED
Search page shows coach cards with country flag badges (US, GB flags visible) - VERIFIED

bugs_fixed_during_testing.issue: Missing translation keys for Subscription page: subscription.current_plan, subscription.premium, subscription.features.*
bugs_fixed_during_testing.fix: Added 'current_plan', 'premium', and 'features' object with priority_booking, no_fees, premium_support, exclusive_content keys
bugs_fixed_during_testing.impact: Subscription page was showing raw translation keys instead of translated text

bugs_fixed_during_testing.issue: Missing translation keys for Reports page: reports.total_sessions, reports.total_spent, reports.coaches_worked, reports.no_data
bugs_fixed_during_testing.fix: Added top-level 'reports' section with all required keys
bugs_fixed_during_testing.impact: Reports page was showing raw translation keys instead of translated text

bugs_fixed_during_testing.issue: Missing translation key for Language page: pages.settings.current_language
bugs_fixed_during_testing.impact: Language page was showing raw translation key instead of 'Current Language:'

context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified working. Translation fixes applied to en_US.json for Subscription, Reports, and Language pages. Account page navigation uses Link components with href attributes like a[href='/edit-profile']. Coach cards in Search page have .market-badge class for country flags. Coach Detail page uses /tutor/{id} route and loads correctly without crashing.
